column3: Total No. Persons Under Trial Including those from Previous Year (Col. 3)
column4: No. of Persons Whose - Cases Compounded or Withdrawn (Col. 4)
column5: No. of Persons Whose - Trial Completed (Col. 5)
column6: No. of Persons Whose - Trial Remained Pending at the end of the year (Col. 6)
column8: Percentage of Persons - Whose Trials Remained Pending (Col. 8) = Col. (6*100/3)
column9: Percentage of Persons - Convicted to Trials Completed (Col. 9) = Col. (7*100/5)

column2: SC/ST Prev. of Atrocities Act, 1989 for STs
